id.description: Id of the productOrder item targeted for this relationship.

relationshipType.description: Type of the product order item relationship, such as [bundled] if the item related product is a bundle and you want to describe the bundled product order items inside this bundle; [reliesOn] if the product item related needs another product order iten (from this order) to rely on (e.g. an option on an already owned mobile access product) [targets] or [isTargeted] (depending on the way of expressing the link) for any other kind of links that may be useful
